AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: chemist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a trained chemist on an Urb-World. [PAWN_pronoun] learned much about synthesizing useful materials from various chemicals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: plant enthusiast
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up, [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed going out into the woods near [PAWN_possessive] home to collect various nice-smelling plants.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ex-Chemistry Teacher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once an innocent chemistry teacher on an Urb-World known for a large black market. When he fell ill, he started applying [PAWN_possessive] knowledge to make drugs to raise money for a Healer Mech Serum. When [PAWN_nameDef] finally got one, [PAWN_pronoun] found that [PAWN_pronoun] loved making drugs, hurting people, and getting rich. From then on, [PAWN_nameDef] grew more and more powerful until becoming a kingpin of a vast drug empire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: chemistry kid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] got a chemistry set for [PAWN_possessive] birthday. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] accidentally discovered how to make Flake, so it was taken away by [PAWN_possessive] parents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: herbologist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] collected medicinal herbs for [PAWN_possessive] tribe, an important role in a society as poor as [PAWN_possessive] was.
